title: I Became A Sacrifice By Chance!
alternative_title: I Became a sacrifice by chance! ; Somehow I Became a Sacrifice! ; 어쩌다 보니 제물이 되었습니다!
status: I Became a sacrifice by chance! ; Somehow I Became a Sacrifice! ; 어쩌다 보니 제물이 되었습니다!
description:
Description :
        Kim Gong Hee was summoned to another world and became a sacrifice for the Dragon King. In order to return to her original world, she needs the help of those who summoned her. In exchange for finding them, the Dragon King proposes a contract marriage. . . A wild and humorous romance unfolding in another world!
